lead_paragraph: HARTZELL--Arthur R., Jr., 89, died on Saturday, December 13, 2014. Arthur, a Wharton School MBA, had been Director of Traffic for Pfizer, retiring in 1987. He Lived at the Churchill on East 40th. During WWII he was a USN Seabee in the Pacific. He will be remembered lovingly as a kind and thoughtful brother, uncle and friend by all who knew him. To leave a condolence for the family please visit: poulsonvanhise.com
